turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Missiamma.
turn.1: Who played the lead role in Missiamma?
turn.2: Bhanumathi Ramakrishna was cast as the female lead, and Gemini Ganesan (then known as R. Ganesh) was cast as the male lead in "Missiamma", while N. T. Rama Rao played the same role in "Missamma". S. V.
turn.3: Who played the role of the parents?
turn.4: Ranga Rao and Rushyendramani and Doraswamy and Meenakshi were cast as the title character's biological and foster parents, respectively, in both versions.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Although all the actors in both versions used the same range of costumes, Ranga Rao wore a "veshti" for the Tamil version in accordance with Tamil custom.
turn.8: Prasad had completed four reels of film with Bhanumathi.
turn.9: Did any of the actors have any issues with shooting?
turn.10: She wrote to the producers, informing them that she would shoot only in the afternoon because Varalakshmi Vratam was being held at her home.
turn.11: Did the producers have any other issues?
turn.12: The letter went astray and Chakrapani, a strict disciplinarian, chastised her for arriving late on set.
